Articles.Content:
So I was interested in who else plays Realistic Progression Zero?

1. What are your goals? What do you want to do?

2. What have you done so far?

3. Do you have any special mods? (like colonization mods or interstellar stuff)

4. Did you catch the 1969 moon landing?

 

 

Concerning me, my goals are to send crewed missions to Venus, Mars and later Jupiter. I also want to land on many moons.

I am using  mostly part mods, but I installed the Uranus moons from RSS Expanded.

No, i did not catch it. I decided to go for better SRB's first, then I had not enough time to research the landing stuff with all its requirements.
